title: Hồng Trần Khách Trạm (紅塵客棧 - Khách điếm hồng trần)
lyrics: Hợp âm: tian ya de jin tou shi feng sha hong chende gu shi jiao qian gua feng dao yin mei zai xun chang ren jia dong li xia xian yunye he gu sha kuai ma zai jiang hu li si sha wu fei shi ming gen li fang bu xia xin zhong you jiang shan de ren qi neng kuai yi xiao sa Giang sơn hai chữ trong lòng liệu người có thể ung dung không wo zhi qiu yu ni gong hua fa jian chu qiao en yuan le shei xiao wo zhi qiu jin zhao yong ni ru huai bao hong chen ke zhan feng si dao zou yu luo su ming qiao ren wu lin shei ling feng sao wo que zhi wei ni zhe yao guo huang cun ye qiao xun shi wai gu dao yuan li ren jian chen xiao liu xu piao zhi zi zhi shou xiao yao yan xia chuang ling xie ying zhi ya yu ni xi di dui zuo yin cha wo yi gong bi hua jiang ni lao lao de ji xia ti bi bu wei feng ya deng xia tan hong yan jin wan xia wo shuo yuan fen yi ru can chan bu shuo hua ni lei ru li hua sa man le zhi shang de tian xia Nước mắt nàng như mưa lê hoa thấm ướt cả thiên hạ trên giấy vẽ. ai hen ru xie yi shan shui hua jian chu qiao en yuan le shei xiao wo zhi qiu jin zhao yong ni ru huai bao hong chen ke zhan feng si dao zou yu luo su ming qiao ren wu lin shei ling feng sao wo que zhi wei ni zhe yao guo huang cun ye qiao xun shi wai gu dao yuan li ren jian chen xiao liu xu piao zhi zi zhi shou xiao yao ren wu lin shei ling feng sao wo que zhi wei ni zhe yao ni hui mou duo jiao wo lei zhong dai xiao jiu zhao qi feng zhong xiao xiao jian chu qiao en yuan le
